posts.caption: www.myth.io
posts.description: Myth is a postprocessor that lets you write pure CSS without having to worry about slow browser support, or even slow spec approval.It's a CSS polyfill.

posts.caption: jakearchibald.com
posts.description: Progressive enhancement has become a bit of a hot topic recently, most recently with Tom Dale conclusively showing it to be a futile act, but only by misrepresenting what progressive enhancement is and what its benefits are.
